title: The Indigo Journals: Spiritual Healing For Indigo Adults & Other Feminine Souls
description: Are you highly sensitive, creative, and empathic, and confused about your purpose in a world that doesn't make sense to you?Then The Indigo Journals holds the answers you've been looking for! From her mystical experiences and encounters with enlightened masters to the cosmic memories that led her to a in-depth exploration of the wounded Feminine, the author takes you on a spiritual healing journey of self-discovery to unlock your hidden power, fulfill your purpose, and bring balance to this crazy world.This book is chock-full of insights and practical spiritual tools to better understand and be at peace with yourself and others. It is for you, if you're ready to:• Embrace your divine difference to transform the world through your own transformation.• Recognize the various soul types inhabiting the planet and prepare for the changes ahead.• Heal an outdated, wounded perception to feel at home and one-in-yourself.• Master the creative power of the Divine Feminine to feel connected and at peace.• Discover your true purpose to bring balance and contribute your unique gifts to promote a new cosmic cycle of light.In addition to the many tools provided, you will also find links to bonus content, to further guide you on your self-exploration.Grab your copy of The Indigo Journals today!
author: Yol Swan
